stages.technical_content: Assemble chassis, mount motors with equal spacing, and secure wheel alignment to reduce drag and vibration.
stages.story_explanation: Think of building a strong robot body like building a race car that must stay balanced on every turn.

stages.technical_content: Connect battery pack, motor driver, and sensors using the wiring map. Verify polarity and continuity before powering on.
stages.story_explanation: Your robot's wires are like nerves sending signals so every part knows exactly what to do.

stages.technical_content: Upload base firmware, run movement tests, and calibrate sensor thresholds for stable behavior in real environments.
stages.story_explanation: Now your robot is in training camp, learning to react quickly and move confidently like a skilled explorer.
